# NWListener.ServiceRegistrationChange.add(_:)

**Case**

The service is now advertising a new endpoint.

## Declaration

```swift
case add(NWEndpoint)
```

## Changes

- **NWListener.ServiceRegistrationChange.remove(_:)**: The service is no longer advertising a specific endpoint.
